content: the ad supported free pattern is here https //christacodesign com/vigo-beanie/ description materials wecrochet brava stripe #4 medium yarn 100% acrylic 218 yd 199 m per 100 g ball in shade candy jar 1 ball or 218 yd comparable yarn 5 mm us size h-8 & 4 5 mm us size g+ crochet hook* or sizes needed to meet gauge measuring tape yarn needle and scissors estimated yarn needed by size baby 0-3 mos ~95 yds / 87 m baby 3-6 mos ~105 yds/ 96 m baby 6-12 mos ~115 yds / 105 m toddler ~130 yds / 119 m preschool ~140 yds / 128 m child ~150 yds / 137 m teen/sm adult ~165 yds / 151 m m/l adult ~200 yds / 183 m gauge with larger hook 4 / 10 cm x 4 / 10 cm = 14 half_double_crochet x 12 rnds sizing to fit age head circumference baby 0-3 mos 14 / 35 5 cm baby 3-6 mos 15 /3 8 cm baby 6-12 mos 16 / 40 5 cm toddler 18 / 45 5 cm preschool 19 / 32 5 cm child 20 / 51 cm teen/sm adult 21 / 53 5 cm skill level intermediate permission you are welcome to sell finished items you make from my patterns please do not use my photos you must use your own photos if you are able a link to christacodesign as the designer would be much appreciated i d love to support you too feel free to email me your shop details so i can like and share the love more keep in touch https //view flodesk com/pages/60ccdd279054a016d112158e find me on your favorite social spot instagram https //www instagram com/christacodesign/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/christacodesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/christacodesign/ christaco crochet community fb group https //www facebook com/groups/311919952679063/ youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucz_uaeq1rql_blo_1cndk8a/ etsy https //www etsy com/shop/christacodesign copyright © crystal marin and christacodesign 2023 christacodesign reserves the rights to the pattern and photographs in this listing this pattern is subject to copyright and intended for your personal use only you may not reproduce nor distribute any part of the pattern
